title.rendered: Douzone Bizon: To Become the Fourth Internet Bank in Korea?

content.rendered: Douzone Bizon announced that it plans to become the fourth Internet bank in Korea. It plans to establish Korea’s first Internet only bank specializing on small and medium sized businesses.

excerpt.rendered: Douzone Bizon announced that it plans to become the fourth Internet bank in Korea. It plans to establish Korea’s first Internet only bank specializing on small and medium sized businesses.
